mapper.select: select id as id, order_id as orderId, sending_id as sendingId, logistic_centre_name as logisticCentreName, logistic_id as logisticId, logistic_fee as logisticFee, logistic_status as logisticStatus, send_store as sendStore, pay_status as payStatus, create_time as createTime, create_by_id as createById, create_by_name as createByName, update_time as updateTime, update_by_id as updateById, update_by_name as updateByName from order_store_sending where 1 = 1 and order_id = #{orderId}
